title: FAQ accordion card
text: In this challenge, you'll be building out an FAQ accordion. This is an extremely common front-end pattern, so it's a great opportunity to get some practice in!

title: Intro component with sign-up form
text: Practice building out a sign-up form complete with client-side validation using JavaScript.

title: Time tracking dashboard
text: A perfect opportunity to practice your CSS Grid skills. For anyone wanting to take it up a notch, we provide a JSON data file to practice working with data.

title: Pricing component with toggle
text: This challenge will get you thinking about building an accessible custom toggle control and also test your layout skills.

title: Social media dashboard with theme switcher
text: This challenge will be a perfect chance to practice your Grid skills. The color theme switcher also adds a nice additional test.

title: Advice generator app
text: The perfect project if you're learning how to interact with 3rd-party APIs. This challenge uses the Advice Slip API to generate random quotes of advice.

title: Sunnyside agency landing page
text: This challenge will be a perfect test of your layout and responsive skills. There's a tiny bit of JS for the mobile menu, but the focus is HTML & CSS.

title: Newsletter sign-up form with success message
text: This will test your skills with basic form structure, validation, and submission. The success state will also be an excellent opportunity to work with DOM manipulation.

title: E-commerce product page
text: In this challenge, you'll build a beautiful product page. We'll be putting your JS skills to the test with a lightbox product gallery and cart functionality!

title: Todo app
text: The classic todo app with a few twists! This app includes a dark/light theme toggle

title: URL shortening API landing page
text: Integrate with the Clean URI link shortening API and play with browser storage in this landing page challenge.
